Producer: Rachel Higgins, David Jowsey, Greer Simpkin, Rachel Clare Higgins, Ivan Sen
Synopsis: Travis Hurley (Simon Baker), a detective, arrives in the remote outback town of Limbo to investigate the cold case murder of local Indigenous girl Charlotte Hayes 20 years ago. As truths begin to unfold about the events of the murder, the detective gains a new insight into the unsolved case from the family, the witnesses and interviews with the brother of the chief suspect.
Title: Limbo
